channel.title: Belgium on Enconn
channel.description: Recent content in Belgium on Enconn

item.title: Brussels
item.author: contact@enconn.fr (Sébastien Blin)
item.description: The day before the FOSDEM, I visited Brussels. It was a 26 km day walk. In the morning I went to Atomium built for the World’s Fair Expo (1958). Then I wanted to go to the “Serres Royales”, but it was raining so I come back in the center. Atomium Atomium Atomium In the center I saw the Palace of Justice a great building you can see far away.
